data.message: A LOT OF LIFELONG FANS ARE NO LONGER FANS DUE TO THAT LINE IN THE SAND. EM AIN'T NO MAN SPIITIN ON UNCLE SAM AND NOT GIVIN A DAMN ABOUT HIS FANS

replies.message: Oh fuck off u and those "fans"
Hey he's your President so deal w it
Piss on him. Not mine
Then get out of our country if he's not your President
Not your President= Not your country
Are u stupid, why do u assume i'm from usa? So idiot...
Not your President= Not your country. Are u communist ???
Go to NK with that lines.

I totally agree Seung-Hun Seo with that statement. This is the part where liberals and Democrats fuck up. I agree with the right to voice opinion on President. But you must respect him. And Eminem tries to force people to choose sides rather than letting them think for themselves

Shut up. Eminem made a career out of telling people to fuck off, regardless of who it is. Half the people in the country diss Trump, nobody says a thing. Eminem says something you don't agree with and your little feelings get hurt. It was a free style, not even a song, and you got offended by it. How about you grow a pair and focus your anger on something a little more important instead of writing a comment in all caps to express said anger, in the hopes that Eminem will either notice you or care. News flash. He doesn't. So go ahead, stop being a fan, not a problem with me. Just don't parade around commenting on his posts about hurt your feelings are. You think your opinion is way more important than it actually is.
But what would Jesus do?
I couldn't stand Obama but I claimed him as my President and respected him. Democrats are just still so butt hurt and turncoat they can dish but don't want to hear any other opinions
My opinion is equally as important as yours so why do you feel the need to jump in? Your doing the same thing as me
Diss donal ✌

No, I'm not. You're (that's how it's spelled by the way) posting a comment with the intent of letting him know how pissed off he's made people. I'm telling you that it doesn't matter what you say because, even if he sees it, he doesn't care. You really think Eminem, the guy who's rapped about having sex with his mom and murdering his ex really cares what one person thinks? He's made a career out of pissing people off. That's why I said you think your opinion is more important than you think it is because you think you're changing something. That you're 'sticking it to him', but you're not.

I don't know if he will see it or not. Or care. I'm just putting my opinion out there. Only thing I'm trying to change is people's hateful mentality. This isn't a spelling bee either so thanks for pointing that out but it has no reflection on my intellect I'm quick typing not emotionally editing my comments like you
And I'm not the only one. He's probably just realizing he's getting old and loosing his fan base anyway so he's just saying fuck it

Emotionally editing? I missed 1 letter, good try though. I type quick as well but still spell correctly, so I'm not sure what you're trying to say. Last time I checked, being able to figure out which iteration of 'your' is needed is a direct reflection of intellect. I never said you were the only one, I said what you're saying has no impact on what he does. That's great thay you're trying to change people's hateful mentalities, but typing an angry comment on Facebook in all caps is not the way to do it. Did you listen to his new song? He does know he's getting old, and yes I'm sure he is aware that he isn't as popular as he used to be, but that 'fuck it' mentality has always been there from the start of his career. It didn't just start now.
Very mature response.

So him dissing Bush didn’t bother you? 

Hypocrite.
Being a fan of an orange clown that shame the usa in the whole world tells us very much about you.
